channel.title: EVM HD Wallet Manager Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and releases for EVM HD Wallet Manager - Multi-Chain Cryptocurrency Wallet by dtrbinh

item.title: EVM HD Wallet Manager v1.0.0 - Multi-Chain Support Launch
item.description: Launch of EVM HD Wallet Manager with support for 1000+ EVM-compatible blockchain networks including Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base and more. Features include HD wallet generation, multi-send/receive transactions, chainlist.org integration, and comprehensive network management.

item.title: Multi-Chain Network Support Added
item.description: Added comprehensive support for 1000+ EVM-compatible networks through chainlist.org integration. Users can now search, filter, and switch between any EVM network with automatic RPC optimization and network icon display.

item.title: Multi-Transaction Features Released
item.description: Introduced advanced multi-send and multi-receive transaction capabilities with real-time progress tracking, gas estimation, and comprehensive transaction history. Perfect for batch operations and fund management across multiple wallets.
